name: Hit Me!
description:
A co-op local-multiplayer game, made for Super Game Pack #2. Visit https://www.facebook.com/groups/1701388070133948/ for all games.

code: deniz aydınoğlu (@slimfitsumo)
music: josie brechner (visager.us)

Controls:
Player 1: cursors + o, p (or joystick1)
Player 2: rfdg + q, w (or joystick 2)

How To Play:
Pick up rocks, burn them using campfires and throw to monsters to kill them. You can use catapult for splash damage and kill multiple monsters at once. Compete to enter global hiscore table if you care.
